name: LOOKinSmartHome
0:
”Alexa,switch on TV”
”Alexa, mute TV”
”Alexa, set Air Conditioner to twenty degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control of LOOKin devices with Alexa.

You can now use Alexa to replace all your IR remotes. 
Supported IR-compatible devices: lights, TVs, Media-players, Robot vacuum cleaner, Fans and Air Conditioners.

This skill requires the smart home solution powered by LOOKin, which includes LOOKin Remote device. 
You would need to sign in with on LOOKin account to use this skill.

Supported devices:
LOOKin Remote

To get started:
1) Connect LOOKin Remote to your home network via the LOOKin Hub app
2) Register cloud account on the settings page in the LOOKin Hub app
3) Create virtual IR remotes for your lights, TV, Media-player, Robot vacuum cleaner, Fans or Air Conditioners follow on-screen instructions.
4) If the created remote control is not a remote control for the air conditioner, specify the type of device on the settings page of the created virtual remote control
5) Add "LOOKin Smart Home" skill to Alexa.

If you have any questions, you can contact us here https://look-in.club/support
